body: If this is real,  congratulations to all of the promotions of staff!
body_tagged: If this is real,  congratulations to all of the promotions of staff!
title: New seniors and managers?

replies.body: Please use the thread designated for staff promotions here.
replies.body_tagged: Please use the thread designated for staff promotions here.

replies.body:
Keep it to one thread, I'm sure a staff member will post the link. Here is the summary 

Theoretical/Demur - Manager
Iron and Michael - Retired
Fouled - Manager
Javipepe - Sr Mod
Greg - Sr Mod
Venny - Mod/Head of teamspeak
